thread.title: Samsung's military-grade mobiles at Gitex Technology Week Dubai
thread.title_full: Samsung's military-grade mobiles at Gitex Technology Week Dubai

author: Staff
title: Samsung's military-grade mobiles at Gitex Technology Week Dubai
text:
Saturday, October 17, 2015 The 5-day Gitex Technology Week runs from tomorrow, October 18, until Thursday, October 22. (Supplied) 
Samsung Electronics will launch its enterprise-ready Galaxy Note5 and Galaxy S6 edge+ at the 35th Gitex Technology Week, the electronics major announced in a media statement. For the enterprise segment, both these devices will come protected by the “iron-clad security” of Knox 2.5, Samsung said. The 5-day Gitex Technology Week runs from tomorrow, October 18, until Thursday, October 22. Samsung said its powerful, defense-grade smartphones will be on display at the event, along with its suite of solutions across six verticals.“Driven by a commitment to relentless innovation, we took our deep expertise in consumer electronics, and developed sector-specific solutions that offer decision-makers high-performing, competitive and secure solutions for every kind of business,” said Mohammed Gharaibeh, Head of Samsung Enterprise Business Group, Samsung Gulf Electronics. The South Korean firm said it will showcase its full business portfolio at the show, covering the corporate office space, education, transportation, retail, hospitality and the quick service restaurant.
